text: Now when they came up out of the water, Spirit of the LordAgain there is no definite article with ‘Spirit’, nor with ‘Lord’—I would like to translate ‘Spirit of Jehovah’, but God's personal name never occurs in the New Testament. snatched Philip away, and the eunuch did not see him any more, because he went on his way rejoicing.He did not stop to look for Philip or attempt any further contact with him; Ethiopia was a long way away and he just kept on going. He doubtless understood that Philip's ‘visit’ was a supernatural present, and let it go at that.
